alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 24 at 8:43PM CDT until March 25 at 4:10AM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Big Nance Creek AT Courtland affecting Lawrence County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Big Nance Creek AT Courtland. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Lowland flooding begins on the left bank of the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 14.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:30 PM CDT Thursday was 16.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening and continue falling to 4.4 feet Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 14.7 feet on 01/04/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
